languages.text: {n}Маражай прищуривается и смотрит на вас несколько секунд, словно пытаясь просверлить взглядом дырку у вас между глаз.{/n} "Какой забавный образец примитивного мышления... Любой друкари стоит бесконечно выше любого мон-кай, и мы не скрываем своего отношения к скоту. Но мои собратья? Любой из них достоин настороженности, а те, кто уже показали свою силу и власть — сами по себе смертельная опасность. Я не наслаждаюсь подчинением — я умею принимать данность. И ждать, когда откроется слабое место, манящее мой клинок".

{n}Marazhai's eyes narrow and he stares at you for several seconds as though he is trying to bore a hole right between your eyes.{/n} "An amusing example of a primitive mind... Any Drukhari towers over any mon-keigh, and we do not conceal our attitude to livestock. But my Kabalite kin? Every one of them should be treated with caution, and those who have already demonstrated their power and might are a deadly threat in their own right. I do not revel in submission — I accept things as they are. And I wait until a point of weakness reveals itself and calls to my blade."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos y te mira fijamente durante varios segundos, como si quisiera agujerearte el entrecejo con la mirada.{/n} «Un ejemplo divertido de mente primitiva... Cualquier Drukhari está por encima de cualquier mon-keigh, y no ocultamos nuestra actitud al ganado. Pero ¿mis hermanos Kabalistas? Trata a todos y cada uno de ellos con cuidado. Quienes demuestran su fuerza y su poder son amenazas letales. No disfruto con la sumisión, pero acepto las cosas como son. Y espero el momento en el que muestren una debilidad al alcance de mi espada».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow and he stares at you for several seconds as though he is trying to bore a hole right between your eyes.{/n} "An amusing example of a primitive mind... Any Drukhari towers over any mon-keigh, and we do not conceal our attitude to livestock. But my Kabalite kin? Every one of them should be treated with caution, and those who have already demonstrated their power and might are a deadly threat in their own right. I do not revel in submission — I accept things as they are. And I wait until a point of weakness reveals itself and calls to my blade."

Cualquier Drukhari está por encima de cualquier mon-keigh, y no ocultamos nuestra actitud al ganado. Pero ¿mis hermanos Kabalistas? Trata a todos y cada uno de ellos con cuidado. Quienes demuestran su fuerza y su poder son amenazas letales. No disfruto con la sumisión, pero acepto las cosas como son. Y espero el momento en el que muestren una debilidad al alcance de mi espada».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛，盯着你看了好几秒，仿佛要在你双眼之间钻出个洞。{/n}“你原始的思维真的很有趣……任何一位黑暗灵族都要远远强于猴子，我们对待牲畜时，并不会掩饰自己的态度。至于我的阴谋团成员？他们之中的每个人都应该被谨慎对待。那些展示出了强大力量的人，本身就是致命的威胁。我并不是享受屈从的感觉，我只是顺其自然而已。我会耐心等待，等到他们显露出弱点，我才会呼唤我的利刃。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow and he stares at you for several seconds as though he is trying to bore a hole right between your eyes.{/n} "An amusing example of a primitive mind... Any Drukhari towers over any mon-keigh, and we do not conceal our attitude to livestock. But my Kabalite kin? Every one of them should be treated with caution, and those who have already demonstrated their power and might are a deadly threat in their own right. I do not revel in submission — I accept things as they are. And I wait until a point of weakness reveals itself and calls to my blade."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは目を細め、まるであなたの目と目の間に穴を開けようとでもしているかのように、数秒間あなたを見つめる。{/n}「頭の悪い種族にしては面白い言い方だな…デュカーリは常にモン＝ケイの上位にあり、家畜への考え方を隠すことなどしない。だが俺のカバライトの同族はどうだ？どれも慎重に扱うべきなのに、その権力と力をすでに示している者たちは、それ自体が己の致命的な脅威となっているんだ。俺は服従を楽しんでなどいない…ただ受け入れているだけだ。そして弱点があらわになるのをひたすら待ち、刃を振るうのさ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow and he stares at you for several seconds as though he is trying to bore a hole right between your eyes.{/n} "An amusing example of a primitive mind... Any Drukhari towers over any mon-keigh, and we do not conceal our attitude to livestock. But my Kabalite kin? Every one of them should be treated with caution, and those who have already demonstrated their power and might are a deadly threat in their own right. I do not revel in submission — I accept things as they are. And I wait until a point of weakness reveals itself and calls to my blade."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai se plissent et il vous fixe longuement du regard, comme s'il cherchait à percer un trou entre vos deux yeux.{/n} « Un exemple amusant des rouages qui actionnent votre esprit primitif... Les Drukharis sont infiniment supérieurs aux mon-keigh et nous ne cachons pas notre mépris envers le bétail, mais pour ce qui est de mes frères kabalites... Chacun d'entre eux doit être traité avec la plus grande prudence, et ceux qui ont déjà prouvé leur puissance représentent une menace mortelle. Je ne me complais pas dans la soumission, je ne fais qu'accepter les choses telles qu'elles sont. Et j'attends mon heure pour frapper au moment où une faille apparaîtra dans l'armure de mes rivaux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow and he stares at you for several seconds as though he is trying to bore a hole right between your eyes.{/n} "An amusing example of a primitive mind... Any Drukhari towers over any mon-keigh, and we do not conceal our attitude to livestock. But my Kabalite kin? Every one of them should be treated with caution, and those who have already demonstrated their power and might are a deadly threat in their own right. I do not revel in submission — I accept things as they are. And I wait until a point of weakness reveals itself and calls to my blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai se plissent et il vous fixe longuement du regard, comme s'il cherchait à percer un trou entre vos deux yeux.{/n} « Un exemple amusant des rouages qui actionnent votre esprit primitif... Les Drukharis sont infiniment supérieurs aux mon-keigh et nous ne cachons pas notre mépris envers le bétail, mais pour ce qui est de mes frères kabalites... Chacun d'entre eux doit être traité avec la plus grande prudence, et ceux qui ont déjà prouvé leur puissance représentent une menace mortelle. Je ne me complais pas dans la soumission, je ne fais qu'accepter les choses telles qu'elles sont. Et j'attends mon heure pour frapper au moment où une faille apparaîtra dans l'armure de mes rivaux. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Augen verengen sich und er starrt dich mehrere Sekunden lang an, als würde er versuchen, ein Loch direkt zwischen deine Augen zu bohren.{/n} "Ein amüsantes Beispiel eines primitiven Verstands ... Jeder Drukhari steht weit über jedem Chem-Pan-Sey, und wir verbergen unsere Einstellung Vieh gegenüber nicht. Doch meine Kameraden von der Kabale? Bei jedem davon ist Vorsicht angeraten, und jene, die ihre Stärke und Macht bereits demonstriert haben, stellen eine tödliche Gefahr dar. Ich finde keine Freude darin, mich zu unterwerfen, ich akzeptiere die Dinge schlicht, wie sie sind. Und ich warte, bis sich ein Schwachpunkt offenbart und meine Klinge zu sich ruft."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow and he stares at you for several seconds as though he is trying to bore a hole right between your eyes.{/n} "An amusing example of a primitive mind... Any Drukhari towers over any mon-keigh, and we do not conceal our attitude to livestock. But my Kabalite kin? Every one of them should be treated with caution, and those who have already demonstrated their power and might are a deadly threat in their own right. I do not revel in submission — I accept things as they are. And I wait until a point of weakness reveals itself and calls to my blade."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor. Birkaç saniye boyunca, gözleriyle alnını delmek istermişçesine sana bakıyor.{/n} "Al işte, gelişmemiş akılların gülünç bir örneği... Drukhariler, mon-keigh'in her türlüsünden üstündür. Sizin gibi hayvanlara hürmet edecek değiliz. Soydaşım Kabalistlere gelince iş değişir. Her birine karşı ihtiyatlı davranmak gerekir. Gücünü, kudretini kanıtlamış olanlarsa başlı başına birer tehdittir. Keyfimden itaat etmiyorum yani, aklımı kullanıyorum. Kılıcıma davranabileceğim, zayıf bir anlarını kolluyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow and he stares at you for several seconds as though he is trying to bore a hole right between your eyes.{/n} "An amusing example of a primitive mind... Any Drukhari towers over any mon-keigh, and we do not conceal our attitude to livestock. But my Kabalite kin? Every one of them should be treated with caution, and those who have already demonstrated their power and might are a deadly threat in their own right. I do not revel in submission — I accept things as they are. And I wait until a point of weakness reveals itself and calls to my blade."

Drukhariler, mon-keigh'in her türlüsünden üstündür. Sizin gibi hayvanlara hürmet edecek değiliz. Soydaşım Kabalistlere gelince iş değişir. Her birine karşı ihtiyatlı davranmak gerekir. traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
